tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE testimonies (
  testimony_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  survivor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  abuse_type VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_abuse DATE,
  location_of_abuse VARCHAR(255),
  testimony_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE survivor (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    age INT,
    location TEXT,
    occupation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_description TEXT,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE testimonies_perpetrators (
  testimony_id INT,
  perpetrator_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (testimony_id, perpetrator_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (testimony_id) REFERENCES testimonies(testimony_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (perpetrator_id) REFERENCES perpetrators(perpetrator_id)
);
